about_the_game:
Rescue your game from a hungry virus named Spunk in this narrative driven exploration game! Befriend or destroy him, tackle challenges and minigames, uncover secrets, unlock customizations, and explore different endings. With GlitchSPANKR's antivirus software every level is different and unexpected!

OVERVIEW

As a 12 year old gamer in the 90's, your curiosity was ignited when your Mom brought home a new game you weren't allowed to play. Big Booty Slapper 6. Unfortunately, there seems to be a rogue virus eating and corrupting your precious game! Using the GlitchSPANKR Antivirus software, dive into virtual worlds and Spank that Glitch! Or befriend him. Or spare his poor, ugly, miserable life. Maybe give him a smooch... fall in love... Oh, uhem. Well there are a lot of options. Just... get in there and figure it out.

                                                            

Physics based Spankin' and Destructin', learn the art of Spank-fu! Almost everything is breakable or interactable. Is your spanking hand wet? Dry it with an air blower! Spanking hand on fire? Well that sucks. Don't like that light? Break the gosh darn thing and live in the dark! Hate that talking toilet that's eating your game? Spank the vile beast!

Choose your own path to find all the endings, every level is different! Do you hate Spunk for destroying your precious Booty Slapper 6 game? Well hunt him down, give no mercy! Do you think he might be redeemed? Consider sparing him, maybe you can even be friends. Do you think there's something... deeper about all this? Well, trust your instincts and see where that takes you.

Complete challenges, find collectables, and customize your trophy room! There are secrets galore! Hidden challenges to find and win! Loot to be found and stolen, I, uh, I mean collected! Take it all back to your home room to customize and decorate!

F...Fall.. in love? I'm just kidding... unless?

Optional - Spank a booty?

Will you ever get to actually play Big Booty Slapper 6? Only time will tell...

content_descriptors.notes: The primary character is generally depicted as a mildly foul and crude character with a bad history.

name: GlitchSPANKR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Directx 11 or 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yeah, you need this. Well only if you want to hear sounds.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Better than the minimum I suppose.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2000-series card or better.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: The minimum, but better?

dejus.descriptors:
Drogas ilícitas
Linguagem imprópria
Atos criminosos

short_description: Rescue your game from a hungry virus named Spunk in this comedic narrative driven exploration game! Befriend or destroy him, tackle challenges and minigames, uncover secrets, unlock customizations, and explore different endings. With GlitchSPANKR's antivirus, every level is different and unexpected!
